'''''Helm's Deep''''' is sixteenth track of [[The Lord Of The Rings (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)|''The Lord Of The Rings - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack'']]. The track features diagetic chanting from the [[Orcs]] during the [[Battle of the Hornburg]]. It contains the soundtrack's main motif.
